column7964: extended PC refresh cycles may  result in a resumption of negative PC sales growth. column2: Coke CEO took 23 pct higher compensation last yearUPDATE 2-Coke CEO declines bonus as company performance falls short March 12 Coca-Cola Co said on Thursday its chief executive declined a $2.5 million bonus in 2014 while other top-level employees received lower-than-expected compensation as the world's largest soda maker struggles to boost revenues amid sluggish demand for soft drinks.  UPDATE 2-Coke CEO declines bonus as company performance falls short March 12 Coca-Cola Co said on Thursday its chief executive declined a $2.5 million bonus in 2014 while other top-level employees received lower-than-expected compensation as the world's largest soda maker struggles to boost revenues amid sluggish demand for soft drinks. TSN,UPDATE 2-Highly pathogenic bird flu confirmed in Arkansas turkeys -USDARPT - INSIGHT-KFC faces pressure after McDonald's says no antibiotics in chicken LOS ANGELES/CHICAGO, March 12 KFC, the world's largest chain of fried chicken restaurants, may face pressure from consumer and environmental groups to change how its poultry are raised after McDonald's Corp said it would switch to chicken raised without human antibiotics.
